underlying_goal: Fix a shell error ('command not found: _activate_venv') that was breaking commands run via Claude Code.
friction_detail: Claude's own shell snapshot tool was the cause of the problem; it failed to capture function definitions with underscore prefixes, creating a broken dependency.
primary_success: Diagnosed a subtle bug in its own shell snapshotting mechanism (it filters out underscore-prefixed functions) and implemented a robust workaround by renaming the problematic function in the user's dotfiles.
brief_summary: A user's command was failing due to a missing shell function. Claude diagnosed the issue as a bug in its own shell snapshotting feature, which was filtering out functions with underscore prefixes. Claude fixed the user's dotfiles by renaming the function to work around the bug.
